title: Very BOLD Italic
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829040204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-02-10%20at%2012_4747.23.46%20PM.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829040204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-02-05%20at%206_5541.19.52%20PM.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829040204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-02-10%20at%2012_6631.29.16%20PM.png)

I really like the boldness in this type, which I found out is Choque Display SSi, BUT seems to have poorly drawn letters and numbers. Is there a type equivalent or exact type that this font stems from?

I was hoping the "real version" exists somewhere out there.

Thanks in advance!

author: BeTheKid

comments.content: Thanks for the response and the lead, I was thinking the same thing when I first saw it.
